text: @realDonaldTrump Welcome Badgers looking forward to bringing #COVID19 pandemic to your state. Matter of fact, dozens of my @SecretService and @WhiteHouse staff already have it and are willing to share! Remember stay close and wear no masks😬Lets increase our world #COVID19 lead #NotMyPresident
